alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 20 at 2:55AM MST until November 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Lower Washington County particularly near Black Ridge including the towns of Pintura, Leeds, Toquerville, La Verkin and Hurricane as well as the area near the Beaver Dam Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
